title: HTML
description: The standard language for structuring web pages.

title: CSS
description: Used to style and layout web pages visually.

title: JavaScript
description: Adds interactivity and dynamic behavior to websites.

title: React.js
description: A JavaScript library for building fast, modern UIs.

description: Used to build scalable backend services with JavaScript.

title: Express.js

description: Automates tasks and system operations via shell scripts.

title: Docker
description: Containerizes apps to run consistently across environments.
